channel.title: Ok, the choice was clear, now theres one more option
channel.description: Ok, Euphoria won by a landslide. My next server is going to be based 100% on skills and quests, I am probably going to start coding tomorrow. Should this be based on the whole runescape map or just one island?

item.title: Ok, the choice was clear, now theres one more option
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

The whole ‘rs world’ isn’t walkable.

Read full topic
